description:
Petit Futé proposes its first interactive applications of French departments with always the same slogan:

“The good addresses of the end of the street at the end of the world !”.

This is an application on line and the application therefore requires a constant connection to the Internet to run properly.

The updates are permanent.

The department is offered with several thousand addresses Classified by several categories :

- All offers
- Accommodation
- Catering
- Visit
- Nightclubs and bars
- Shopping
- Activities
- Beauty, Wellness
- House, decoration, garden
- Festivals, events
- Information
- Food

Features :

- Geolocation
- GPS location addresses on the map with navigation on line
- Search by category in the department or near
- Smart Search by keyword in the department or near
- Addresses presented with : Petit Futé reviews, useful information, contacts, reviews, photo slideshow, call the hotel directly or send him an email.
- Function “just type” : information is sought from the TouchPad without going directly through the application

Soon  100 other destinations available (cities, departments, regions in France and abroad).

Petit Futé website : www.petitfute.com
